title: FollowMyHealth®
description:
Access and manage your health information on-the-go with the mobile version of your Universal Health Record powered by FollowMyHealth®.
View test and lab results, request prescription renewals, communicate securely with your physicians, schedule appointments, and more – for you and your family with 24/7 online access!
description_html:
